Agenda

Rails World featured two full days of keynotes, talks, workshops, sessions and more. All sessions on the two main stages were recorded and will be shared soon.

Friday, October 6th

  • Wednesday

    October 4th

  • Thursday

    October 5th

  • Friday

    October 6th

Schedule is in Central European Summer Time (CEST)

  • 08:00 - 9:30

    WNB.rb Breakfast sponsored by Shopify

  • 09:00 - 9:45

    Doors Open

  • 09:45 - 11:00

    Rails Core AMA

  • 11:00 - 11:40

    Powerful Rails Features You Might Not Know

    Chris Oliver, Founder, GoRails

  • 11:00 - 11:30

    Rails and the Ruby Garbage Collector - How to Speed Up Your Rails App

    Peter Zhu, Senior Developer, Shopify

  • 11:45 - 12:15

    Rails::HTML5 - the Strange and Remarkable Three-Year Journey

    Mike Dalessio, Director of Engineering, Shopify

  • 11:45 - 12:15

    Demystifying the Ruby package ecosystem

    Jenny Shen, Senior Developer, Shopify

  • 12:30 - 13:30

    Lunch

  • 13:30 - 14:00

    Just Enough Turbo Native to Be Dangerous

    Joe Masilotti, Owner/Founder, Masilotti.com

  • 13:30 - 14:00

    Applying Shape Up in the Real World

    Ryan Singer, Owner, Felt Presence

  • 13:30 - 15:00

    Workshop - AI Driven Development

    Cynthia Lo, Program Manager, GitHub

  • 14:15 - 14:45

    Untangling Cables and Demystifying Twisted Transistors

    Vladimir Dementyev, Cable Engineer, Evil Martians Inc.

  • 14:15 - 14:45

    Tailwind CSS: It looks awful, and it works.

    Adam Wathan, Founder, Tailwind Labs

  • 15:00 - 15:30

    Hotwire Cookbook - Common Use Cases, Essential Patterns and Best Practices

    Yaroslav Shmarov, Ruby on Rails mentor, SupeRails

  • 15:00 - 15:30

    Wildest Dreams of Making Profit on Open Source

    Irina Nazarova, CEO, Evil Martians Inc.

  • 15:00 - 16:00

    Workshop - Test Smarter, Not Harder - Crafting a Test Selection Framework from Scratch

    Christian Bruckmayer, Staff Engineer, Shopify

  • 15:45 - 16:15

    Don't Call It a Comeback

    Jason Charnes, Staff Product Developer, Podia

  • 15:45 - 16:15

    Monolith-ifying perfectly good microservices

    Brian Scanlan, Senior Principal Systems Engineer, Intercom

  • 16:30 - 17:30

    Closing Keynote - Future of Developer Acceleration with Rails

    Aaron Patterson, Rails Core & Senior Staff Engineer, Shopify

  • 17:30 - 19:00

    Rails 20th Anniversary Celebration
